Introduction

Big Ocean is a three-member boy group under Parastar Entertainment. They debuted on April 20, 2024, with the digital single "Glow". They are the first hard-of-hearing group to debut in the K-pop industry.

The members of Big Ocean are Chanyeon, Hyunjin, and Jiseok.

Their name "Big Ocean" symbolizes the ocean as a place where people feel calm and peaceful. Big Ocean hopes to spread hope and positive energy in the future. Their fandom name "PADO" means "Wave" in Korean.
